sections.name: Intro
lyrics: ***Intro***

sections.name: Couplet
lyrics: Just a cast away, an island lost at sea, oh
Another lonely day, no one here but me, oh
More loneliness than any man could bear
Rescue me before I fall into despair, oh

I hope that someone gets my
I hope that someone gets my

lyrics: A year has passed since I wrote my note
I should have known this right from the start
Only hope can keep me together
Love can mend your life but love can break your heart

sections.name: Couplet
lyrics: Walked out this morning, I don't believe what I saw
A hundred billion bottles washed up on the shore
Seems I'm not alone in being alone
A hundred billion castaways looking for a home
